reporting-org.narrative: King Salman Humanitarian Aid and Relief Centre

title.narrative: Joint Implementation Program For KSRELIEF and FAO to implement Agriculture ,Food Security and Nutrition Sensitive Response to the Most Vulnerable Households.

description.narrative: -Improved food security and nutrition outcomes for vulnerable households through integrated nutrition-sensitive programs -Improve knowledge in the production of high nutritional value vegetables and prevent malnutrition for poor farmers and vulnerable families -Increased productivity of high-nutrient vegetables by vulnerable households and improved household food diversity (qualitatively and quantitatively).
The project aims to carry out an integrated response to agriculture and food and nutrition security for the poor farmers and the most vulnerable families in Taiz and Hudaydah governorates.

participating-org.narrative: Food and Agriculture Organization of the United Nations (FAO)
King Salman Humanitarian Aid and Relief Centre
